title: Nargun
data:

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An ancient stone creature that has lived among these frozen caves since before Antaeus rent Cocytus into being. It tolerates its new neighbors begrudgingly, preferring the company of its petrified enemies. Veins of ice permeate its frozen stone flesh. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Narguns** are found in [Cocytus](/Cocytus "Cocytus"). They have high melee damage, but tend to have their ability to use it restricted by Cocytus’s layout of [deep water](/Deep_water "Deep water") lakes and rivers. Instead, they prefer to attempt to [petrify](/Petrify "Petrify") you, causing almost certain death if other dangerous Cocytus enemies (such as [hellions](/Hellion "Hellion") and [wendigos](/Wendigo "Wendigo")) surround you.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                               |                                                      |
| :---------- | ----------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Petrify](/Petrify "Petrify") | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Petrification immunity (granted by [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form"), [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") or being a [gargoyle](/Gargoyle "Gargoyle")) will render them utterly trivial.
- Otherwise, stacking Willpower is extremely important to avoid the extreme amounts of damage caused by being pelted with [seracfalls](/Seracfall "Seracfall") and AC-ignoring [damnation](/Damnation "Damnation") while you are forced to stand still.
- Narguns *can* be irresistibly damaged by [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction"), but the shrapnel they spray deals [cold](/Cold "Cold") damage, which is virtually useless against most denizens of Cocytus.

## History

Narguns were added in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").

Nargun

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
nargun 9 
HP 35-72
HD 22
XP 1078
Speed 10
AC 25
EV 4
Will 100
Attack1 40 (hit: vulnerable)
Attack2 30 (bite: cold)


Resistances rC+++
rElec
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
rPetrify
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Medium
Type golem, nargun
Flags See invisible
Fighter
An ancient stone creature that has lived among these frozen caves since before Antaeus rent Cocytus into being. It tolerates its new neighbors begrudgingly, preferring the company of its petrified enemies. Veins of ice permeate its frozen stone flesh.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Narguns are found in Cocytus. They have high melee damage, but tend to have their ability to use it restricted by Cocytus’s layout of deep water lakes and rivers. Instead, they prefer to attempt to petrify you, causing almost certain death if other dangerous Cocytus enemies (such as hellions and wendigos) surround you.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Petrify Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Petrification immunity (granted by Statue Form, Storm Form or being a gargoyle) will render them utterly trivial.
  • Otherwise, stacking Willpower is extremely important to avoid the extreme amounts of damage caused by being pelted with seracfalls and AC-ignoring damnation while you are forced to stand still.
  • Narguns can be irresistibly damaged by Lee's Rapid Deconstruction, but the shrapnel they spray deals cold damage, which is virtually useless against most denizens of Cocytus.

History

Narguns were added in 0.28.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Nargun&oldid=62964"

rawPage:
{{version028}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Narguns''' are found in [[Cocytus]]. They have high melee damage, but tend to have their ability to use it restricted by Cocytus’s layout of [[deep water]] lakes and rivers. Instead, they prefer to attempt to [[petrify]] you, causing almost certain death if other dangerous Cocytus enemies (such as [[hellion]]s and [[wendigo]]s) surround you.

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Petrification immunity (granted by [[Statue Form]], [[Storm Form]] or being a [[gargoyle]]) will render them utterly trivial.
*Otherwise, stacking Willpower is extremely important to avoid the extreme amounts of damage caused by being pelted with [[seracfall]]s and AC-ignoring [[damnation]] while you are forced to stand still.
*Narguns ''can'' be irresistibly damaged by [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]], but the shrapnel they spray deals [[cold]] damage, which is virtually useless against most denizens of Cocytus.

==History==
Narguns were added in [[0.28]].
